name: Avelia
description: Delve into a low-poly survival adventure. Craft, build, thrive, breed animals, master fishing, farming, face formidable bosses. Elevate skills with stats, levels, a skill tree. Equip magic, bows, and swords to survive and dominate in a captivating medieval world

name: Letters & Legends
description: Embark on an epic linguistic adventure in Letters & Legends, where words and wits are your greatest weapons! Sharpen your tongue and show your enemies who the true wordsmith is!

name: Kingdom of Arcana
description: Embark on a magical odyssey in Arcania! Play as Aurelius, a skilled mage battling to liberate five kingdoms from the tyrannical grip of the sinister Malachus. Explore 50 levels across 5 enchanted realms, conquer 20 bosses, and unveil your destiny in this gripping third-person roguelite adventure.

name: Depths of Insanity 2
description: A Dark Sick Cartoony Shooter/Adventure/RPG. INDIE-MUSIC SOUNDTRACK OF 100 SONGS! Aliens - Space - Monsters - Sausages!

name: Interstate Cowboys
description: Interstate Cowboys is a role-playing game set in Neo Vista City, a mix of 80s aesthetics and near-future technology. It features dual protagonists with AI-generated NPC dialogues, dynamic relationships, immersive synthwave aesthetics, a blend of RPG elements with arcade driving, and heist planning.

name: Seka II
description: Lead a fearless team of mice up to 8 players through challenging test chambers! Dodge traps, battle foes, break barriers, collect cheese, and uncover the secrets behind the experiments. Join the mission now!

name: Brass Necessity
description: In this top-down, sci-fi shoot 'em up, you'll have to solve combat-based puzzles in order to escape the cursed undead. You've only got your laser as a weapon and crystals to change its element. You'll need to figure out matchups that work best against enemies to escape. Good luck, you'll need it!

name: Stellar Outpost Commander
description: Stellar outpost commander is a real-time strategy game with indirect control, where you have to build a base, explore the surrounding space, discover new technologies, and, of course, hire pilots, each with their own character, and assign them a ship corresponding to your mission objectives.

name: Cymut x Mutrobo: The Last Cymut
description: Cymut x Mutrobo: The Last Cymut is an action and strategy game where the Last Cymut, Watfrog, seeks to free his companions in the territory of the Mutrobos. He faces enemies and bosses in a world full of traps. Explore, collect items, and complete missions in this exciting adventure.

name: Roadway Traffic Racer
description: "Roadway Traffic Racer" is an exciting and thrilling game for lovers of high-speed racing on the highway.

name: SuperTaxCity
description: In a country where taxes are repeatedly raised, you become the owner of a certain city and develop it. Build facilities, expand the city, and create a city that will not be defeated by tax increases!

name: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
description: Social fishkeeping is back! Tiny Aquarium is a real-time online aquarium simulator. Breed and sell fish, decorate, and visit your friend's aquariums with bite-sized daily sessions.

name: The Scar
description: The scar is an open world adventure and survival game, where you can create your own weapons and tools, build bases and fight against what were once humans and aliens. You will be able to use Ashun's summons, which to our eyes is magic.

name: Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother
description: Mrs. Chen is asked to pick up some documents; these documents reside at the University of Tokyo where she used to work. Upon her picking up these documents, she engages with audio recordings and diary entries that tells her what exactly took place in the experimentation room.

name: Sengoku: Battle Royal
description: In the 5V5 strategy competitive game, you will play the role of a daimyo, managing and developing your power within 60 minutes, eliminating all enemies. You need to strategize or engage in close and distant attacks to achieve victory together with your allies.

name: Multiverse Battle Royale
description: Multiverse is the ultimate real-time, world-switching battle royale! Engage solo, or assemble a team to overcome the Multiverse challenges. Adapt, survive, and conquer across ever-changing realms. Claim your place as the multiverse champion!

name: Neural Shock
description: In Neural Shock, you must cleanse the world of horrid and bloodthirsty creatures by utilizing turrets, traps, wits and weapons. Choose from different class choices with unique playstyles and over 20+ different turrets and traps in this unique sci-fi Tower Defense / Action RPG.

name: Hex.Plan.X
description: Retro-style sci-fi top-down post-apocalyptic shooter and strategy game.

name: Smash Cup
description: Dive into the Smash Cup universe! This genre-blending top-down shooter allows you to craft your own base, combining MOBA, tower defense and deck-building elements for a unique battle experience!

name: The Land of Magic
description: Are you a challenger? Master obstacles, complete worlds and set new high scores. Play new challenges every day by racing against the clock, collecting stars or crossing mysterious obstacles. Play the current season and get exclusive rewards for your ghost.

name: LAN Party
description: Experience online gaming like never before! LAN Party is designed to be the perfect compliment to your gaming group. Whether you're playing the same game competitively, cooperatively, or playing different games entirely, LAN Party makes communicating and sharing gameplay so much easier.

name: Gnomdom
description: Gnomdom is a point & click puzzle game where you find little gnomes stuck in various places and help them return to their home.

name: Murder
description: Are you ready for an adventure where you become a detective or a murderer in multiplayer? Become a detective or a murderer in Murder

name: Zombie Royale
description: Get ready for a battle royale experience full of zombies on a huge map for 100 players

name: Medieval March
description: Medieval March is a medieval survival game where you can fight for survival with a medieval theme. You can invade villages with your own team and start new wars against your opponents.

name: My Succubus Kukula
description: "My Succubus Kukula" is a cute pixel clicking game. Kukula, the succubus, suddenly barges into your house, and if you don't sign a contract with her, she'll kill you! ^o^, Save me!! Life and death are both in your hands, so be careful not to anger Kukula.

name: Your letter has been rejected.
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Killing Zombie
description: The stickman world is in a zombie epidemic- kill zombie stickmen with your epic red sword!

name: Freak Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Unseen: 2007
description: Reality is a canvas painted with lies.

name: Highway Police Simulator
description: Welcome to Caminora! Immerse yourself in the authentic police work of the American Highway Patrol. Solve cases, chase criminals and explore the open-world. Choose your officer and tackle the everyday life on the highways. Will you be able to maintain law and order?

name: What The Pak?!
description: What The Pak?! is an online, multiplayer party game. Play as little, mischievous monsters called PAK and annoy your life-long friends as much as you can. We genuinely ask that you don’t hold back. Throw them overboard and steal their chickens. They’ll be like “WHAT THE P…”

name: Space Query
description: This simulation software brings the solar system to your fingertips, allowing you to explore the orbits of planets and witness the fascinating effects of introducing new cosmic objects like asteroids, extra suns, or even a black hole.

name: Play Together Lite
description: Compete with your friends, family and frenemies in this party game collection! Use your phones or tablets as your controllers, supports 2-8 players! Action games, turn-based, board games, we have it all! More games coming soon!

name: Moth Cry
description: Moth Cry is a non-linear visual novel about life and its consequences. Experience life alongside the main character. His fate is in your hands.

name: Death From The Darkness
description: "Death From The Darkness," a horror game where survival takes precedence in harsh conditions without conventional weaponry, facing a formidable adversary. There are no hints; you must be vigilant and use your wit to endure. Darkness conceals both danger and salvation.

name: Attack of The Worker
description: "Attack of the Worker" is a rogue-lite, pixel-style bullet shooting game where players experience the life of a worker in a tech company.

name: Tomato Flip
description: An athletic game in which you control a tomato to reach the goal pot! Run through to clear all the stages!

name: Juice
description: Enjoy the binge of a ravenous Monster vs the last stand of a lone survivor in this dual narrative fps about the end of the world!

name: Inferni: Hope & Fear
description: Inferni: Hope & Fear is a unique combination of deck builder and battle royale, creating the world’s first 8 player online coop card game.

name: Cowboy vs. Zombies
description: In this thrilling fusion of roguelike, first-person, and third-person gameplay, every decision you make matters.Explore the surrounding area for valuable resources and other survivors. Armed with your trusty six-shooter and a pickaxe, confront the relentless zombie onslaught.

name: Bokkie
description: Dare to enter the world of "BOKKIE" where the line between childhood innocence and supernatural terror is blurred, and every corner hides a secret waiting to be unveiled. Will you brave the haunting whispers of the abandoned toys, or succumb to the darkness that lurks within?

name: Korean Rail Driving Tour: LRT Uijeongbu
description: This game is a railroad simulation game that allows you to experience actual railroad operation based on video footage of the driving direction of an actual train. Get feeling of being a train driver just by operating the accelerator and brakes. Enjoy “real” video of S.Korea’s beautiful scenery!

name: OutlawZ: Headhunter
description: Just remember, if you mess up big time, you could lose everything, even your life. So, for safety's sake, always make sure to keep your valuables in the safe zone.

name: Let's Battle Online
description: Action online game Three-player battle for the win! Win by knocking your opponent off the field or reducing their HP to 0! 1 vs 1 single mode 2 vs 2 cooperative multiplayer mode In the cooperative multiplayer mode, you can fight together with your friends!

name: Staying Fresh
description: Manage the culinary heroes, fight the rotten zombie food. Use fresh food to upgrade and create new defenders. Explore the abandoned kitchen in search of ingredients and new recipes.

name: Curling in the Dungeon
description: The princess must be rescued and the mighty dragon killed! You're the perfect candidate, here is your sword, shield and... curling stones? Nevermind, there's no time to lose! Countless of enemies, items, powerfull relics, fancy characters and unexpected events are waiting in the dungeon!

name: Hangar 1914
description: Become a hangar worker, your task is to repair and maintain aircraft during World War I. The fate of these sky machines and their pilots is in your hands - start your adventure on the front of World War I.

name: Mindform
description: Experience the thrill of climbing with Mindform: a first-person climbing game. Challenge yourself, even when it hurts, and learn to embrace setbacks, cultivating perseverance and celebrating the joy of overcoming obstacles—the essential ingredients of a pro athlete's mindset.

name: Let's be a Tiger
description: Let's Be a Tiger is an exciting and immersive game that puts you in the role of a powerful tiger in the wild.

name: Marine School Simulator
description: School life experience on island in the tropical sea... with Flying Shark! Go to school, play with friends in town, and exterminate dangerous creatures. Experience the life of a student on a mysterious southern island.

name: Fall
description: This is a roguelike shooting game with a strategic top-down angle and a third person perspective. The once bustling city is suddenly invaded by a mysterious virus, and infected citizens become extremely aggressive overnight. When it falls, lead your remaining soldiers to battle.

name: Mooon
description: MOOON is a miniature theme park beyond earth. Controlling remotely, switching between giant and mini avatars, passing scaled houses and 3D puzzles. Who am I? Explore in this unique 2.5D platformer!

name: Untraveled Lands: Chantico
description: Explore the wild depths of "Untraveled Lands: Chantico" a captivating card-based survival management game mixed with roguelike elements. Build a village, manage survivors, craft essential items and equipment. Unravel jungle mysteries to find your way home through a world lost in time.

name: Nature Escapes 5
description: Nature Escapes makes a return with exciting surprises for both old and new players!

name: NewMe NuMe LuMe: Alien Wars
description: Summoned into the otherworldly realm of 'NewMe NuMe LuMe', the protagonist Kim Ttolttol must aid the gods who summoned him to defeat enemies and return home in this 2D top-down action game. Utilize a variety of weapons to vanquish diverse foes!

name: Choo-Choose
description: So, have you ever heard of the Trolley Problem? Do you know the price of the choices you make? How far are you ready to go to act according to your values? Will you sacrifice a life of the other to hold the moral high ground?

name: 7 Days Blood Moons
description: 7 Days Blood Moons is a 4v1 fight to the death. Survivors fortify bases and scavenge for materials in their plight against the relentless horde. The Zombie Hive Master commands and possesses the horde to crush the survivors. Who will prevail?

name: Strongest Angel Zerachiel!
description: In a city that worships the Goddess of Fortune, an angel descends. Her name is Zerachiel. Zerachiel struggles to rescue her comrades who are imprisoned by the cult, but she is defeated and stripped of her powers by a girl claiming to be a saint...

name: Nonu
description: Nonu is a fantasy souls-like set in a beautiful hand-drawn world. Face intelligent enemies in true souls-like fashion, with a unique twist. Draw upon the power of Nonu to forge your own fighting style, and uncover untold truths about the world, and its inhabitants.

name: Endless Tactics
description: Endless Tactics is a turn-based roguelite game. Play as the commander of a high-risk planetary mining operation, defend your base from alien creatures while trying not to get overrun. Use resources to upgrade your starship, unlock new technologies, powerups, and deadly new worlds to harvest.

name: Zoe Begone!
description: Hand-drawn bullet-hell! A frenetic shooter combining the run-and-gun mechanics of Metal Slug with the infinite loops and shmup-ing of Resogun, wrapped up with old-fashioned drawn-on-film style animation. Fight your own creator as the artist bears down on you with pen and paintbrush!

name: Sushido
description: Jump, dash, shoot, and slash your way through endless waves of evil sushi ingredients in pursuit of the highest score possible. Do you have what it takes to harmonize all seven abilities and become a true master of SUSHIDO?

name: Xurb
description: Society has collapsed, use any means to survive in XURB. Loot and shoot your way out of intense PvPvE raids. Use what you find to build up a camp, and recruit survivors you find along the way to help you. Play solo, or with friends, and explore the dangerously desolate exurbs.

name: Erlking
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Watch Your Ass
description: The congressman Oleg Mizulin is a staunch homophobe. He proposes a law to ban all gays of all the land. Oleg argues with one of “them” at the parking lot and tells the man about his villainous plans. The lights go out and now the congressman’s ass is in mortal danger.

name: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy
description:
As a member of your town's Adventurers' Guild, it's your job to protect the townsfolk. Go on hunts, kill dangerous beasts, and hone your abilities to better tackle whatever challenges tomorrow brings.

Once you get home from work, you'll have your sister to attend to. She's a very sickly girl who needs a lot of help. Manage your household finances well, build up your relationship with your sister, and who knows, perhaps you might even be able to solve the mystery behind her illness.

name: Spectral Scream
description: "Spectral Scream", a horror party game is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players. You need to survive the purgatory between life and death. Don't stop running from the ghosts attacking you. There's no time to be shaking in fear.

name: Snyatcher
description: Granny’s gone and the cats are going crazy! Solve this cat-astrophe by chasing the cats through this 3D platforming cat collectathon. Use your gadgets and athletic abilities to put a stop to the feline chaos and solve the mystery of Granny's disappearance!

name: Atman: Rebel Flame
description: "Atman Rebel Flame" is a cyberpunk card-building game that supports multiplayer battles with no external numerical growth to ensure fairness . Choose your hero and support cards, elevate your phase and select talents, defeat opponents and claim victory!

name: Searching
description: A turn-based RPG game where every attack requires skillful timing

name: Region: Gear D
description: Embark on an immersive VR FPS adventure! Customize your guns and outsmart AI foes in exhilarating PVE combat. Get ready for a unique strategic shooting experience, coming soon to Steam. Your ultimate VR battleground awaits – don't miss out!

name: FolkOrigin
description: Start taking control of the map and build buildings, recruit units, fight monsters and conquer enemy villages. It's a 2D game in which you move on a hexagonal map. A strategy game combined with an RPG game. All in the times of the ancient Slavs. More information soon...

name: Ship's Cat
description: As the chief anti-rodent specialist aboard a passenger ship you must rid the ship of mice. Explore the ship and eat the mice in this third person action walk-em-up.

name: Market Simulator
description: You've embarked on a journey to acquire your dream market and have finally reached your goal. Now, manage your market to offer friendly service to the neighborhood! Provide a range of products, from beverages to food, cleaning items to electronics, meeting community needs.

name: Gelli Fields
description: Gelli Fields is a cozy farming game. Befriend magic slimes, travel the world, and enjoy fun activities like bug catching and fishing all to remove corruption from Continaa.

name: Haruki's Journey
description: "Harukis Journey" is a challenging jump-and-run adventure for ninja enthusiasts. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Gruel
description: Go on a rampage in this endless arcade Boomer-Shooter! Gain the weirdest weapons and destroy all the monsters in the never-ending temple of GRUEL!

name: Kami
description: Embark on the ultimate adventure in "Kami," a game that seamlessly blends action-packed roguelike exploration with deep strategic elements. Navigate through ever-evolving dungeons, harness the power of unique pets through evolution, and unlock extraordinary abilities.

name: Watch Out For Goblins!
description: Experience the joy of physics based goblins in their natural habitat! Run, jump, kick and flip your way through a delightful physics sandbox! Explore and collect Power Cogs to become Goblin Royalty! There's no saying what might happen, and no stopping the BIG GOBLIN ENERGY!

name: Soul Eater
description: The player embarks on a journey through a sword containing the soul of a being desperate for revenge against their past betrayers. As the player travels the world, they seek out those who betrayed them in the past, and with each encounter, they have the opportunity to seize their souls.

name: Invaders Tower Defense Online
description: Build your ultimate defense with a combination of powerful towers. Attack your opponent with strong Invaders. This game is sure to offer a unique and immersive experience for all tower defense enthusiasts!

name: Confusion
description: Confusion - first person horror. The main character is an experienced detective named Derek. One day he has to go out on a call, although this was not his responsibility. This event will radically change his life...

name: Psychometric Personality Profiler
description: This is a very interesting personality Test made to specifically suit you as the Perticipant. Please be honest about the answers and take your time. And by all means don't take your eyes off the screen...

name: Suspended Animation
description: A sci-fi first person exploration game about a ship in danger, and the evil AI tasked with saving it: you.

name: PlunderPiece
description: A puzzle game where you move chess pieces to plunder treasure. Try to collect all the coins in as few moves as possible. Includes over 49 levels! (50 to be precise).

name: Cyber Workshop
description: Cyber Workshop is a resource creation video game. You control a transporter drone in a small workshop and, using the machines available to you, create custom items for order - drones, reactors, implants, and so on.

name: Cube Guy
description: Cube Guy is a 2.5D platformer with simple yet fun dodging, turn based boss battles, secrets, and a lot more!

name: The Silent Bells
description: Dive into the eerie realms of "The Silent Bells," a spine-chilling horror anthology video game. Unearth five haunting stories, each a twisted tapestry woven from the threads of internet horror and creepypastas. Brace yourself, for every silent bell tolls the arrival of a new nightmare.

name: Underpowered Night Spooks
description: Underpowered Night Spooks is a racing game that takes place in Japan in the early 1990s. Challenge a friend or an online player to a one-to-one race on tough courses where any distraction can cost your victory.

name: The Choices We Make
description: Adding that feature before launching tomorrow might be the best or the worst decision of your gamedev life. Try to make the best game possible with the limited time you have in this world of unlimited consequences. Spend your time wisely, create, experiment, grow.

name: GearGrit
description: Tansy Geargrit, charged with some crimes she did commit, and some she didn't... Explore, platform, and blast your way through GearGrit, an Action Platformer inspired by your favorite PS2 games!

name: Eclipse Breaker
description: Defeat the sun god and restore light to the world in this action roguelike. Face off against enemies and bosses in skill-based tactical battles that combine turn-based and real time combat. Progress through a godly realm as you get stronger by stealing the elemental power of your enemies.

name: Route8
description: "You're lost on Route 8. You must find a way to escape. This eerie road is terrifying.""Night falls, the phone rings. Who are you? You find yourself driving along Route 8, repeating endlessly."

name: Survivors
description: Break through the siege and welcome the dawn of victory! Eight skills, twelve maps, three hundred talents, top-down survival Roguelike game! Through repeated battles, the character becomes stronger and more fearless, surrounded by monsters.

name: Animal Rogues
description: Animal Rogues is a dark rogue-lite dungeon crawler bullet-hell with rpg elements. You play as an animal who fights against one possessed beast after another! Discover unique interactable objects such as slot machines, dices.. Collect magical items and level up to become more and more powerful!

name: Fear & Hope
description: Can you help solve the mystery and more importantly do so before its too late?

name: Lone Hero Path
description: The idle game is mainly about improving skills and equipment. You will meet pets and people with the same path, communicate with them, discover various strange equipment and items, and collect various skills.

name: Duckthing's Rolling Rooms
description: A room based puzzle-platformer with a weird duck.

name: My Love With The GirlsGroup
description: Under Seoul lights, as a substitute driver, you take an order from a mysterious girl. Facing you is the popular girl group, Little Angel. Smartly posing as their manager, you become an overnight music industry icon! Love's scent and career prospects beckon - how will you decide?

name: Cat Secretary
description: Keep your job by day. At night, sneak around the office and solve your colleagues' problems. Who's a good Cat Secretary? You are!

name: Moved Mind
description: Moved mind is a first person narrative psychological horror game, where you will be the subject of a psychological experiment where you will have to face your fears and differentiate reality from the symptoms of your illness.

name: Mattami Restaurant & Cafe Tycoon
description: ♪ Mattami is a restaurant tycoon game where you start with a tiny humble place and work your way up. Manage your staff, their schedule and inventory to efficiently grow your restaurant as fast and as elegant as possible.

name: BlitzBot
description: BlitzBot is a minimalist and modern arcade game that expands the air hockey genre. Take control of a robot and dive into dynamic and thrilling battles, where the objective is to score more goals than your opponent. Utilize the unique abilities at your disposal to destabilize and take the lead.

name: SwayBods: Physics Puzzle Game
description: In this physics puzzle game, tap the bubble monsters to move them in a pendulum like swaying movement along the arc. Time the taps carefully so that the monsters do not bump into each other. Get all the monsters in a level swinging to complete the level.

name: Hateful Days
description: George Prinkerton gets caught in a time loop. For every person, this is something shocking and even terrifying. It would seem that a very simple young man is transported into the cycle of events that will forever change his life.

name: Law: Transporter
description: LAW (pronounced Land Air Water) is an arcade transporter racing game about transporting goods and passengers by land, air and water.

name: Railpunk Mayhem
description: All aboard! Enjoy a unique, fast-paced roguelike action experience. In Railpunk Mayhem, survive relentless waves of enemies at breakneck speeds, build a powerful train to manage your crew, and strategically plan your route to the source of chaos.

name: Gosdooma
description: In the magical land of Marsia, the most important day in the last 1000 years is approaching - the election of a new ruler! You have to vote for the right candidate or you will be sent to the front to fight for the survival of the great empire! Immerse yourself in a wonderful world with your shotgun!

name: Art of Blades
description: Art of Blades is a hand-drawn top-down isometric simple hack-and-slash. The art is inspired by Japanese manga and anime. The gameplay is a very simple hack-and-slash based on rock paper scissors. Scissors to attack, rock to block, and paper to dodge.

name: Torso Tennis
description: Draft limbs, build your bod, then go head-to-head in rapid-action tennis matches against formidable foes. Sell your limbs, upgrade your limbs, get permaboost tattoos, and perfect your body-build to ace the season and clench victory in this thrilling run-based roguesports game.

name: Nomadica
description: A new world exploration where you can do anything you want. Crafting, bulding, hunting, fishing, mining, farming, cooking, visiting villages, meeting native people, trading and exploring dungeons for better loot and uncovering mysteries of ruins and buried cities

name: Last Standing
description: This is an action game in which players compete to defeat the number of enemies that appear from the left and right sides of the screen. The most distinctive feature of the game is the control method, which is innovative and original, like banging on a keyboard.

name: Helbreath Nemesis
description: Helbreath is a dark medieval MMORPG featuring intense PvP, strategic alliances, and a trade-centric economy. Choose between two warring factions and immerse yourself in epic battles and quests in a vast fantasy world.

name: Angel
description: ANGEL is an PSX-era rhythm racer that imbues the flow state of racing with the complexity of breakbeat music to redefine arcade racing and combo-based gameplay. FFO: Breakcore, serial experiments lain, and existentialism

name: Bloom Thrice
description: Embark on a journey through the gamified "Beautiful World", play (fight) with residents until you are satisfied, and explore to the end of the world. "Bloom Thrice" is a 2D action adventure game where you join the world full of brightness and kindness.

name: Cats of the Qing Dynasty
description: Embark on a journey through the ancient city of the Qing Dynasty, and search for adorable cats! Experience the delightful collision between cats and historical settings and characters.

name: Walrus Run
description: Walrus Run is a 2D Action Platformer, compatible with conveniently-shaped bongo controllers. Slide, dash and eat through obstacles to get a high score and take back your fish from the greedy Sargent Seal!

name: We Were Monkeys
description: Trying to escape the lab with your monkey pal, your realize the experimentations made you two see things differently. Can the two of you find your way out in time ?

name: Liar's Game
description: This is a social inference game, you and your companions lurking in the evil forces, find your right partner, in the mysterious maze, together to complete the task! The game has randomly generated splicing plots, and has a variety of classes and props to play, let you and your friends to have fun!

name: OwnTrio: Adventure
description: A game in which the protagonist can multiply himself up to three times, and then reunite them.Self 1 and Self 2 move with the goal of meeting each other.And self 3 manipulates the map to help self 1 and 2 meet.And they manipulate these actions by themselves at the same time!

name: Space Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixelgroove
description: Embark on "Pixelgroove," a one-of-a-kind shmup adventure where your chosen music video's visuals and beats transform into exhilarating gameplay. Each video's distinct imagery directly influences the game's dynamics, crafting an experience unique to every song.

name: HighScore Anomaly Shop
description: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress

name: Coyote: An Old West Vignette
description: Coyote: An Old West Vignette is a tiny point-and-click adventure game about a gruff marshall on the trail of a deadly outlaw.

name: The Unknown Strain
description: Embark on an epic journey where magic meets mystery in a vibrant world. Uncover ancient secrets, battle mystical creatures, and explore breathtaking landscapes. Your adventure begins now! Will you unravel the truths that are hidden behind family secrets?

name: Category 6
description: Brace yourself for the ultimate open-world survival craft experience. Welcome to a world shattered by the relentless fury of the most colossal hurricane in history. You are thrust into the eye of the storm, tasked with not just enduring, but thriving in the aftermath of nature's wrath.

name: Wake Cup
description: Fight against the flock of tired workers on a boring Monday morning with a cup of coffee and grow the economy. Build, sell, lose, improve, repeat! A clicker tower defence game with rogue-lite meta progression.

name: Rigid
description: Rigid is a fast-paced game all about sick parkour action at high speeds.

name: No Heroes Here 2
description: A group of non-adventurers is the last hope in defending the castle in this co-op roguelite chaotic game. Organize your castle, purchase new items each day, work as a team to craft ammo, and shoot at enemies to protect your kingdom. Just because you’re no hero doesn’t mean you can’t save the day!

name: TLC Game BR
description: TLC Game is coming!, get ready to play!

name: Gooner on the Orient Express
description: Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train. Goon on the train.

name: Fur and Fables
description: Dive into Fur & Fables, a party based bullet heaven roguelike! Assemble a party of adventurers, level up, and recruit new friends along the way. Experiment with party composition and synergies to fit your playstyle to save Fabletown from the endless hordes of monsters!

name: Killmage
description: The Sound rings into the night, don't stop, kill them all.

name: Toyful Wonderworld
description: A retro first-person game inspired by shooters of the 90s. Collect weapons and blast your way through the mysterious Toyful Wonderworld, where a cast of colorful enemies will stand in your way. Discover the secrets of this weird place and find out what has caused the Toyfriends to go crazy!

name: Imitosis
description: An experimental 5-minute visual novel. A security concern demands your attention.

name: Code Red
description: Code Red is a first-person horror adventure game. Avoid the horrific creatures roaming the otherwise lifeless facility and survive the experience.

name: Bet Your Brain
description: Bet Your Brain is a trivia game with the twist of gambling. Players alternate between answering questions and participating in gambling minigames to accumulate the most wealth. Compete against bots or your friends in an attempt to call yourself the King of both knowledge and luck.

name: BioDive
description: Led to a remote exoplanet by a distress signal, B3-4K discovers a laboratory under the surface of the planet. Push blocks, flip levers, and turn mirrors to solve puzzles and explore the mysteries of the laboratory.

name: RTS Tactical Warfare: Siege Survival
description: The enemy attack on your base is imminent; secure your defenses, mobilize your troops, reinforce key positions, and get ready for the next battle. RTS Tactical Warfare will test your resilience and strategic prowess.

name: Breathless: Will you Understand Me?
description: A cute romance kinetic novel with a mental health message

name: Office7
description: A guess-the-difference game modeled after an office hallway.

name: Tokyo Desire: Deck Builders
description: "Tokyo Desire" takes the deck-building roguelike genre in a bold and innovative direction, inviting players to weave their own narratives deep within the neon-lit depths of Tokyo.

name: Cathexis
description: Ancient pillars crumble into the sea. Cathexis, the power to remake this broken world, will be nothing more than scattered shards. Scale the towers. Unlock their secret chambers and awaken the relics within. Do what you must…before it all comes crashing down.

name: Thanks Mom
description: "thanks mom" is an adventure game where you control a baby. You are given milk by your mother and sleeping soundly. In your dream, you remember the trials and tribulations that happened in the past. It may have been the days of struggle before you were born.

name: Casino Management Simulator
description: Run your own casino in "Casino Management Simulator"! Manage staff, games, and finances to build your gambling empire. Compete with rivals and keep guests entertained to become the ultimate casino tycoon!

name: Rasvyat Nuclear Power Station
description: A co-op game where you operate an RBMK-1000 reactor in real-time.

name: Super Harvester
description: This is a fun auto chess game. Choose and equip magic weapons, cultivate amazing plant and monsters. Build a team to penetrate the arena!

name: Sinister Night 2
description: Nine Streamers enter an ancient Chinese mansion, hoping to attract a huge following and become famous through livestreaming. However, two of them are tragically possessed by evil spirits. These possessed will slaughter their companions, and complete a malevolent ritual of a ghostly wedding.

name: Thunder Ronin
description: Thunder Ronin is a samurai souls-like boss rush. on your way to take revenge on your familty. slash, deflect, and dash through powerful foes. fighting in ancient japan between sakura trees and the glow of the moon.

name: Maximum Gas!
description: Maximum Gas! is an action-packed racing game designed for adrenaline junkies and speed enthusiasts who love the sound of roaring engines.

name: Quad Bike Crazy Driver
description: Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in Quad Bike Crazy Driver, where you'll assume the role of a fearless quad bike rider on a mission for speed and excitement.

name: Gears Story
description: A mechanic and a prisoner's extraordinary tale. A simple novel game with minigames.

name: Plumber Survivors
description: Plumber Survivors is an arena action with Roguelike elements. Play as the formidable Plumber (and his friends), repel hordes of zombies and other vile creatures. Grab you plunger tight and plunge into the fight.

name: Gun And Sword
description: An idle game for casual players. Features combat in idle mode, crafting equipment, and managing a farm. Still in development.

name: Hardcore Survival
description: "Hardcore Survival" is a PvP-focused game where you start with a rock on a beach, build shelters, tame dinosaurs, and raid other players' bases in a prehistoric, dangerous world. Survive, dominate, or fall in this high-stakes adventure.

name: Warcos 2
description: Warcos 2 is a dynamic multiplayer shooter where you'll engage in battles on diverse maps, utilizing your skills, gadgets, and abilities to their fullest to overcome the enemy and snatch victory from their grasp.

name: Super Onion Boy+
description: Super Onion Boy+ offers an exhilarating journey in a 2D platformer filled with action and adventure, in the nostalgic retro style. Your mission is to rescue the princess, who has been imprisoned in a magical bubble by a terrible monster.

name: Reason Unfound
description: Your brother's unexpected death leads you to unsettling locations in search of floppy disks with cursed retro games.

name: Bhop up!
description: A bug that became a game mechanic.You will find yourself in an incomprehensible, abstract world, among flying islands and various biomes, in the setting of the Middle Ages.

name: TiaDar
description: TiaDar is an Action-Slasher game with RPG elements.

name: Vietnam '66
description: The successor to the critically acclaimed Vietnam '65!

name: Bro YuanShen Survivors
description: A survivor-like game where you control magic to kill monsters.

name: Hard Chip
description: Hard Chip is a 3D simulation/puzzle/optimization game about building processors focusing on realism. Explore the world of semiconductor chip design and delve into the intricacies of CPU logic, floor planning, and propagation delay.

name: RollTale
description: 3D and Rhythm Based Music Game Jump and avoid obstacles on the platform

name: Depths of Darkness
description: Your car falls victim to a horrifying attack at the entrance of the village. The owner of a nearby mansion notices you and invites you into his home. In this atmosphere filled with fear and suspense, explore the ancient mansion infested with creatures and uncover the dark secrets of the past.

name: Cubint
description: Cubint is a shooter roguelite where you go against a horde of enemies. Use Ally Shooting Turrets to your advantage. Upgrade different Buffs and unlock various Synergies to get stronger. Get powerful Spells that enable tons of new builds.

name: Mazelit
description: Light your way through mazes, collect energy, and level up to gain upgrade points. Don't get cornered by enemies or you will face hefty repair costs. Those high-tech upgrades break easily!

name: E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon
description: Manage your product company ! Design concept and sell product on the market ! Dodge bankruptcy and rise to the top by making the best concept, the best pricing strategy and applying the best management ! Beat all those damn competitors !

name: Zako no Ahiru
description: You can't clear it, can you, mister? So lame, so lame ♡♡♡

name: Shelf Life
description: Shelf Life is an action FPS set in a near future conglomerate, that will seem eerily familiar if you spend your time around online dumpster fires. Use your arsenal of weapons to shoot, burn and fungible-ize your way through the Edison facility fighting a lizardy hostile takeover.

name: Cosmic Horror Tales
description: A top-down action RPG about a farmer searching for his chicken on the edge of a town filled with horrors beyond human comprehension.

name: Super Cubiform
description: As a Guildship Captain you must rely on your wits and a computer repair program to survive! Super Cubiform is a sandwich of genres, Arena Action Platformer + First Person Adventure! Enjoy arena-based platforming action as the Cubiform, and an urgent mystery as the Guildship Captain...

name: Mask Around
description: Mask Around is an action-packed, weird and colorful 2D roguelite with tons of hidden secrets. Buy weapons & items, unlock masks with unique powers and combo enemies using melee attacks and shooting power.

name: Sauna of The Dead
description: Sauna of the DEAD is an action RPG where you become a wave master, swinging your towel to blast hot air at zombies and demons in the saunas of the underworld, sending them to ascend. Power up with sauna goods and drinks to blast the underworld's inhabitants into ascension.

name: Hammer Knight
description: In Hammer Knight, you'll face an army of machines powered by ancient technology, relying solely on your architectural skills and the engineering hammer in your hands to combat the onslaught of machines.

name: Pai
description: In a mysterious world, the protagonist finds himself surrounded by monsters and robots. These monsters may come from another dimension, while robots are created by technologically advanced civilizations. The hero must uncover the secrets of the world and fight these monsters and robots.

name: Soul #531
description: As a recently deceased ghost, you only remember one thing, You have to get back to your dog. Fight enemies and solve puzzles to escape the underworld in this action puzzle platformer. Explore the different layers of the underworld, and face challenges along the way, drawn in a charming 2D style.

name: Monster Mash
description: A wacky VR monster city destruction game! Use kooky mutated weapons and eat delicious, high-powered snacks, delivered by alien invaders as you take revenge on the evil pharmaceutical corporation that created you.

name: Placeground
description: PLACEGROUND is a building spaces simulation game with a focus on architectural design aesthetics. In this game, you have the opportunity to create and decorate both your interior and exterior spaces. Meanwhile, NPCs interact with your creations, crafting unique and abstract narratives.

name: Rhodesia '72
description: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire Rhodesian Bush War, from Llewellyn Barracks to BMAT (Jul '64 - Dec '79)

name: Beyond Terra
description: Beyond Terra is an computer game that transports player into a world where they can build cities in Earth's orbit and explore the mysteries of the Moon. In this game, player take on the role of space pioneers aiming to colonize space and establish a thriving civilization in Earth's orbit.

name: Take a Look
description: "Let's scold the troublemaker butlers!" Go on an adventure where you have to become a cat agent and get rid of the butlers.

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 2
description:
Add 4 Lumen songs to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle, including tracks previously exclusive to Azure Striker Gunvolt supplemental CDs in Japan!

This song pack for Lumen adds the tracks "Pain From the Past", "Stratosphere", "Struggling to Dream" and "Twilight Skyline"

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 3
description:
Add 4 Lumen songs to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle, including tracks previously exclusive to Azure Striker Gunvolt supplemental CDs and the animated feature!

This song pack for Lumen adds the tracks "Last Station", "Traces", "Reality" and "Sign"

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 4
description:
Add 4 Lola tracks from the Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX series to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle!

This song pack for Lola adds the tracks "Raison d'Etre", "Search Light", "Beyond Probability" and "Love's Sanctuary"

name: Down Word
description: Create four letter words with falling tiles before the screen fills. Utilize powerups and careful preparation to create multiple words at once to achieve multiplier bonuses!

name: Commandeer
description: This top-down sci-fi shooter features a unique “commandeer” mechanic that lets you hijack any ship you see. Take over star-fighters, cargo ships, and even entire battle stations. Explore a galaxy filled with dark humor, absurd characters, and strange environments on a quest to get your ship back.

name: Reports from Vera Cruz
description: Investigate the country of Vera Cruz in this journalistic first-person adventure! Solve puzzles, take photos of clues and report news exposing the horrific truths behind General Galba and his bizarre government!

name: On Track
description: On Track is a cozy productivity tracker to help you rejuvenate, relax, and focus on tasks you want to accomplish. Watch a lush landscape roll by as you watch from your cozy train seat. Set a timer to focus, manage a todo list with all your goals, and relax as you stay on track.

name: Anzeigenhauptmeister Simulator
description: No exceptions!Make the streets (in)secure as the Master Chief of Criminal Complaints and conquer the leaderboard of the local online watch!

name: Bovine Battles
description: In a world where cows have gone crazy, you play as a cow and battle against other enemy cows for victory. This is a COD-Like shooter game where you battle against your friends, online opponents, or even aliens using goofy and powerful weapons and abilities.

name: Shinzen Hollow
description: Embark on a journey in Shinzen Hollow, a captivating farm-sim RPG set in the Japanese highlands. Beyond farming, discover secrets, form bonds with NPCs, and tackle mysteries. With combat, crafting, and the beauty of changing seasons, experience a world filled with endless adventure and tranquility.

name: Sleeping Forest
description: Hey there, Legends! Dive into "Sleeping Forest" – where you lead a ragtag squad on a perma-death quest for glory! Round up buddies for local co-op, solve puzzles, and shape epic tales. It's medieval mayhem with a side of romance!

name: Holy Shoot
description: In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against demonic forces.

name: Iz
description: In search of truth, pursuing the darkness… pixel RPG with adventure elements, based on Turkic myths in the setting of 15th century Kazakh steppes.

name: 2048: Dungeons
description: A game that mixes 2048 puzzle mechanics with a roguelite style of play, creating deadly battles where staying calm and thinking strategically are essential for victory. Make improvements, train your character, recruit allies and try your luck in the terrible dungeon of Blockshire.

name: Graveyard Shift
description: Scavenge, tiptoe, and fight your way to the surface in this dangerously cute puzzle and stealth game where everyone can hear—but not see—everything you do.

name: HyperBody
description: Dive into HyperBody dungeons: an experimental VR walking simulator blending architectural ruins, cult themes, sensorial vibes, and queer narratives. Navigate mysterious realms and affective tales, and immerse in a psychedelic, rhythm-fueled cosmos. Experience a meditative, aestheticised trance!

name: Cozy Marbles
description: Cozy Marbles is a small relaxing game about building your own marble runs. Create short & satisfying tracks or huge intricate marble machines. There's no rules or management - just sit back and experiment in this tiny physics sandbox.

name: Dreadshot
description: Dreadshot is a fast and dynamic first-person shooter with parkour elements. The gameplay wants to combine all the best mechanics of modern shooters into a cohesive whole, аnd the plot is a deep satire on the current state of the gaming industry.

name: Clean City Project
description: A rabbit-shaped cleaning robot flies around collecting, shooting, and destroying to restore the beauty of the city. A sandbox shooter game!

name: The Russian Roulette Game: PR
description: The classic Russian roulette with friends, With a small twist to bring more chaos and fun to the gameplay.

name: Sword Princess Sistina
description: Since a young age, Sistina has been lauded as the Sword Princess thanks to her masterful bladework. When the Demon God is accidentally unleashed, those skills are put to the test as she faces unstoppable adversaries!

name: Sheryl: The Alchemist of the Island Ruins
description: Play as Sheryl, a purehearted alchemist, who must gather ingredients and craft them into items and medicine, in her journey to become a five star atelier!

name: The Way of Cooking
description: Dive into a colorful 3D cartoon parkour game where each leap and step brings adventure. As runners, creators, and explorers, players have the freedom to design their own paths. The "free-build" mechanism transforms individual creations into adventures, blending creativity with exploration.

name: Element Release: Water Territory
description: The element race gifted on Element Release rules the ungifted slave, but appearing of the Element Ring breaks the mold. The rebellion of slaves raid the Water Territory, and the lord spells a Water Enchantment. As a memory loss prisoner of element race, the most important thing for you is escape...

name: Mashiroiro Symphony HD: Love is Pure White
description: A winter-themed romcom visual novel with four main heroines and one mysterious cat-like creature! In a town where tradition and modernity meet, protagonist Shingo Uryu's whole life changes when he begins attending the prestigious Yuihime Girls Private Academy...

name: Sublimity
description: As the girl Chloe, you have fallen into the backrooms and are exploring the surroundings, while hiding from scary creatures. Try to survive long enough to maybe find a way out...

name: Mashiroiro Symphony HD: Sana Edition
description: A one-route standalone expansion for the fan-favorite visual novel Mashiroiro Symphony. The main character's classmate Sana finally takes the spotlight with a new story and new CGs by artist Tsubasu Izumi!

name: Booty Barrage
description: Command the defense of a pirate haven against relentless waves of enemy ships. As the guardian of your treasure-laden island, it's up to you to man the cannon and repel the invaders before they breach your defenses!

name: Murder Avenue
description: Welcome to the neon-lit, crime-ridden streets of 1970s New York in "Murder Avenue," an immersive first-person detective game that plunges players into a world of mystery and intrigue. Each crime scene reveals cryptic clues, leading you deeper into a labyrinth of deception and danger.

name: Only Pinball
description: At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern. You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.

name: Star Scum
description: Star Scum is a deckbuilding tactics card battler about space pirates. Build your deck and customize your ship as you travel across dangerous space delivering cargo in a roguelike mode or build custom decks and battle other players online or practice against an AI opponent.

name: King Island 2
description: Embark on an adventure to uncover the mysteries of Kaptivo's transformation into an Arcane Warrior in this thrilling hack'n'slash action Flash RPG and sequel to King Island.

name: 0th floor.: The Cursed Elevator To Floor Zero
description: You've been trapped in an elevator that always goes to the 0th floor. Don't overlook any anomalies, and try to move to the designated floors.

name: They Fear The Mist
description: They Fear The Mist is a real-time strategy game, where you command your Troops, build your Settlement, fight off thousands of Enemies and explore the Unknowns of the Mist. Take command of your people and defend them from the incoming hordes… Can you survive?

name: Sea of World
description: Battle Feel is a fun, survival, action-packed game that you can play online together also have a singplayer mode. The game takes place on an PvP Metro Map. Battle Feel has great graphics. Included types of game.

name: Strategic Command WWII: War in the Pacific
description: Fury Software completes its trilogy of WWII games with Strategic Command - WWII: War in the Pacific, enabling you to re-fight the great land and naval campaigns of this amazing theater. Are you ready to avenge the Day of Infamy?

name: Feed The Beast
description: Make The Beast eat all the other players, that's the point of the game. But also! You have many characters to chose from, all of which have their unique abilities that can aid you with fighting your opponents.

name: Synapse
description: 「Synapse」is a game based on cooperative play with horror and thrills. Players must cooperate in a dark space to avoid robots, hack into facilities, and escape. The only thing players are given is a sense of helplessness and fear of death.

name: OMG Words
description: Bringing roguelike mechanics to classic word games. Use relics to create powerful combos, play boons to craft you tiles and board, use your powers to defeat a host of tricky opponents.

name: Frontier Paladin
description: You are an Apprentice Paladin, following your Master on your first quest. Survive by engaging your enemies in deliberate and impactful combat with a variety of play styles. Rally your beleaguered Order, improve your Castle and it's defenses, and hold fast against the Warlords of the Crater.

name: Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen
description: Command a squad of guardians in a thrilling deckbuilding, roguelike card battle to save the world from an Android army invasion. Fight, fall, learn, rise again!

name: Slime Wars
description: 2D Strategy game.

name: Blood & Dungeon
description: Blood & Dungeon is an action game that revolves around the struggle of a captured soldier to survive and escape from a dark and blood-scented dungeon

name: I Commissioned Some Invisible People 0
description: I paid more artists to hide invisible people in 3 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: SparSpecial
description: - Player vs CPU fighting game. - Keyboard based controls (Arrow(s)). - Attack until enemy loses! (first attack with ,J, key). - Different Maps! Different Soundtracks! Different characters!

name: Cosmic Tankinator
description: Cosmic tankinator is a hard and rapid action 2D fighter game. Blow up your enemies as you wish, with everything from large laser turrets to landmines! Upgrade your tank between each mission and go from starbase to starbase obliterating enemy turrets and tanks!

name: The Temple
description: The Temple is an interactive visual novel game adapted from the short story of the same name by H. P. Lovecraft. The game is being developed by a single person.

name: Speedway Challenge 2024
description: Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Gumbowl's Adventure
description: You play as the main character Gumbowl and have to get your missing gumballs.

name: Chushpan
description: Violent street gang wars have rocked the city. What do you remember about the main urban bands of the “USSR phenomenon” of the 1990s? Feel those times for yourself.

name: Freestead Castle Defense
description: Build up your defenses, fortify your camp and fight back the demon horde that has come to take what little you have left.

name: Kingmaker
description: Kingmaker is a chess-like game with a few twists. With all new pieces and an expanded board to play on it will give you a unique experience and many challenges on your way to becoming the kingmaker!

name: Surbird
description: A thrilling blend of strategy, action and magic, challenging players to use their arcane abilities to protect the innocent from the forces of darkness.

name: Planet Royale
description: Compete in the galaxy's most watched game show! Battle Royal on a planet that is being destroyed by a giant laser; each round players are eliminated as the world itself is destroyed and the escape pods become more scarce. Be the last person standing in a battle of wits, weapons and brute force.

name: Fumble Fiesta
description: Fumble Fiesta is a whimsical multiplayer party game designed for up to 4 players. Navigate through a series of colorful obstacle courses, filled with wacky challenges and unexpected twists. Compete against friends or random opponents as you race, jump, and tumble your way to victory.

name: The Realm
description: The player lost in a village in another world is looking for a way out alone.

name: The Endarkenment
description: This is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse itself is just the beginning of The Endarkenment. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas all while the world ends.

name: Space Sprouts
description: Launch into a chaotic spaceship adventure: bend the rules of physics, experiment with unusual gadgets and toss everything around. With each journey, you will have limited time to reveal the mysteries aboard your solar punk spaceship - how much will you discover before you arrive home?

name: Sky Dominion
description: Sky Dominion is a War Simulation-like shooter where the player has to protect their aircraft, while being attacked from the ground, until the aircraft reaches the end of its capabilities and the round ends. At the end of every round the player can see the score they reached.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

name: Golf & Domino
description: Introducing the ultimate remedy for boredom: the Golf & Domino game, a captivating hybrid simulator that combines the finesse of golf with the strategic thrill of dominoes.

name: Orb of Aeternum
description: A bite sized dungeon manager game that requires new strategies every time you play! Mine, build, and fight your way to success.

name: Flank Speed
description: Flank Speed is a simple top down Newtonian space shooter based on the aesthetics and style of early 90s arcade games. Everything from the designs, textures, sounds and gameplay are made to capture that arcade feel in a simple yet enjoyable game.

name: Backrooms: Lethal Expedition
description: Immerse yourself in a chilling cooperative adventure with friends as a member of an exploration expedition, heading into the depths of the levels of the infamous creepypasta "Backrooms" filled with horrifying entities, deadly puzzles, and liminal spaces.

name: ZombieCam
description: ZombieCam is a bodycam-style first person shooter zombie game. Coming Q4 2024.

name: Shinkansen 0
description: Shinkansen 0 is a Japanese horror game set on a Shinkansen (Japanese bullet train).

name: The Next Kingpin
description: This is a mafia themed First Person Shooter game to become the next Kingpin. You will travel around the city streets filled with other mafia families who all feel they should be the Next Kingpin of New York.

name: Pinch 50 Renpatsu!!
description: “50 Pinch Barrage” is a highly casual side scrolling action game! With simple controls, the player must use their wits to squeeze by pinch after pinch and escape the mysterious island!*The Free Edition is an original stage in which you can train your action gameplay skills.

name: Soundelta
description: A rhythm game with a unique spin: Spinning. Push your skill to the limit with 3 sets of 3 lanes on a spinning notefield. Featuring a growing roster of songs, VFX in every map, and a powerful editor for custom maps.

name: Rising Sands
description: Discover the secrets of what really happened after the war.

name: Rolling Combine
description: Combine Fruits and get score in this mass physics 3d Game!In Rolling Fruits, you combine 2 same fruits for next bigger one. You can use this unique physics in game to combine same fruits!

name: Impossible Game
description: Press keys, unlock achievements. Gets harder until it's downright impossible.

name: Operation Athena
description: Operation Athena is a tactical first person shooter that takes inspiration from classic tactical shooters with updated modern mechanics. Take part as an operator of Athena Team solo or with up to 4 players against a global terrorist threat.

name: MoonWhite
description: Moon White is a short and easy action game featuring Chinese Kungfu. It tells about a journey how two elves compete with each other, looking for the harmony of traditional dance in each movement and posture.

name: Shadow Detective
description: "Shadow Detective" is a first-person 3D horror adventure game for solo play where you can enjoy exploration and scenarios to find the cause of supernatural activity while protecting yourself from ghosts at a high school during the night.

name: Fantasy of Esula
description: A first-person shooting game with distinct world adventures. You will explore Esula, a planet full of unknown dangers and opportunities. Travel through mysterious floating islands, and find the only truth to save this world from falling apart.

name: There's No Easy Wayout 99
description: An amazing adventure game. Sometimes as a RPG and Humour game aswell .

name: Duel of games
description: In the real world, the Game of the Year is about who is more fun to play,while in the gaming world,the Game of the Year is about who can fight better.In order to compete for the title of Game of the Year,games transform into fighters and engage in combat.Duel of classic game protagonists,pvp/pve/eve

name: Woolly Boy And The Circus
description: 'Wolly boy and the Circus' is a hand-painted style puzzle game. The game mainly tells the story of the protagonist, Our wolly boy, who is trapped in the "Big Pineapple Circus" and searching for a way out.

name: Reviver
description: A narrative puzzle game with themes of love, fate and time. Follow the life stories of the two main characters and influence their destinies through interactions and choices. The game combines hand-drawn style and an immersive interactive experience to explore a profound journey of love and choice.

name: No Bugs On My Windshield
description: Don't let them touch your windshield!

name: Headlice
description: Headlice is a reverse horror game where you play as an escaped biological abomination fleeing an inept corporation. Embrace your parasitic nature and become the monster you were meant to be.

name: Multiverse Loot Hunter
description: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

name: Spacewind The Zeppelin
description: a zeppelin that shoots arrows where you can acquire improved skins and powers for your adventure

name: Astria
description: In Astria you are playing a young hero who travels the world to avenge his loved ones. But he will soon realise that he is destined for much more.

name: Revolutionary Quest
description: The revolutionary quest is another quest from the Buka company, developed by VZlab. This adventure game with a third-person view will take us to the origins of the revolution, tell us about it, as well as about the people who participated (or allegedly participated) in this event.

name: Merchants of Rosewall
description: As a new Merchant in the bustling city of Rosewall you'll manage your own shop, craft artisan goods, hire Companions, and even unravel a mystery of the city! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where conflict is a thing of the past in this narrative driven, fantasy shop keeper simulator.

name: The Heirloom
description: The Heirloom is a 2D single player mysterious thriller adventure with puzzle elements inspired by the atmosphere of the Hebrides and Scottish folklore, where players are given the opportunity to make fateful decisions while navigating through a story full of secrets and mysteries.

name: Super Soccer
description: Epoch's soccer sports game for the Super Cassette Vision.

name: Lumen
description: Live your adventure from the Ruby Forest to the fortified city of Bromure.

name: Cave Command
description: Intrude the enemy cave, collect fuel, aviod mines and heat seeking missles.

name: Oh Chute!
description:
You are Ron Danger, stunt person and extreme sports enthusiast. You just can’t get enough of sky-diving, but the local helicopter pilots have had it with your antics and are out to get you… It’s up to you to show them who’s boss!

Choose one of four different levels of varying difficulty and see how long you can survive. Sky-diving is hard enough alone, but those darned pilots aren’t going to make it any easier for you. Keep an eye on their movement and choose the right time to open your ‘chute and manoeuvre to one of the designated landing zones.

name: Battland
description: An unreleased action-strategy game developed by HAL Laboratory with a focus battling, and it looks similar to the Fire Emblem series.

name: Gash And the Ultimate Boner
description: GASH is a short retro inspired 3D platformer à la Banjo Kazooie or Conker's Bad Fur Day.

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Bundle
description: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: ChainBeet
description:
This app is music game that even advanced users can enjoy!
The system is very simple and anyone can easily play.
Over 800 songs and 3400 charts included.

name: Terraformers + Starward Rogue: Mechs and Colonizers Deluxe Bundle
description: Colonize Red Planet or fight in a mech - Mechs and Colonizers Bundle!

name: Tiny Gems Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Extended Edition
description: The Extended Edition contains the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers game and the Garage Bundle.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Bio Inc. Redemption: Medical Herbs Bundle
description: Explore medical influence of weed and cure patients!

name: Power Tools VR
description: Power Tools VR allows you to try out a variety of power tools in a safe environment, allowing you to learn how to use such tools without the risk of harm to yourself or others around you.

name: Seduction of Beauty
description: "Seduction of Beauty" is a brand new first-person immersive interactive video game, where you will embark on a unique and extraordinary love journey with six distinctive female protagonists.

name: Shining Girls
description: Shining Girls is a relaxing puzzle game and multiple unique sexy girls.The game is a jigsaw puzzle, where players move puzzle pieces to restore the original image.

name: Border Mountain
description: "Border Mountain" tells the story of four adventurers at the Herac Camp, who embark on their adventure after a war between the Imperial Army and the legion of monsters. Players will journey with them through snowy mountains, explore mysterious caves, and ultimately find their own path of adventure.

name: Dwarven Realm
description: Explore an epic fantasy medieval world where dwarves fight for survival in a hostile universe. Guide your colony of dwarves through unique challenges, tough moral choices, and unforgettable encounters. Explore, mine, build, trade to ensure the prosperity of your people.

name: Slime Climber
